subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|東|東|曰}}; the top two {{lang|zh|東}} have merged and now resemble {{m|zh|曲}} with an extra stroke.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[plaintiff]] and [[defendant]]
# [[division]] [[department]] of the [[central]] [[government]] in ancient times
# [[official]]
# [[group]], [[team]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
#[[Cao]], the name of a vassal state in China during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-221 BC), covering roughly the area of modern-day Dingtao County in Heze, southwestern Shandong province
